Text:
Look I'm not seeding this kind of rare to find on Torrent movies just because I love you guys, I'm also doing it so that YOU can share it with others. I posted this 4 months ago, and i'm still the only seeder!!!

So now it's your fault, I'll keep seeding, but at 500bps... that's 500 bits per second... it means that it'll take about 3/4 months to complete. It will complete but it will just be painful... so learn your lesson and SEED.

I will seed it for a while maniaco007 but I'm a snail at 39.5%.
Heard good things about this movie (loved the City of God)
Is there any chance you could allocate a little more bandwidth please(or reseed?)
Many thanks from a fellow movie addict :-)
